content:
In some of the detailed element descriptions there are comments. eg items 18 & 19 here: http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7NZ/hpi/branches/master/StructureDefinition-HpiPractitioner-definitions.html

Where do they come from, and can they be changed?
They correspond to ElementDefinition.comment. They're inherited from the base resource. You can override them or add to them, but you can't remove them.
Actually - I meant to say examples! But I see there is an example in ElementDefinition so will play with that...
